'''Fudou Style Martial Arts''' is [[Shikanoin Heizou]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Unlike most [[Catalyst]]-wielding characters, Shikanoin Heizou's Normal and Charged Attacks produce [[hitlag]] when hitting an opponent.
*Unlike most Catalyst-wielding characters, and like most [[Sword]]- and [[Polearm]]-wielding characters, Shikanoin Heizou's Charged Attack must be preceded by at least one Normal Attack.
;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|1|Named Juvenile Casebook}}
